title: Just Say Maybe

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **During** the game, you may undo any event that occurs, this processes immediately. You may be alive or dead, and may do this once per game.
- **During** the game, you may have whatever the fuck you want to happen, happen. The host, obviously, has the authority to veto your request if they declare it too overpowered. You may be alive or dead, and may do this once per game.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If this is part of the Daily Streak Faction, it cannot act while dead.
